title: Kimi Raikkonen's Words Will Change Your Life -- /SHAKEDOWN
description:
When Kimi radioed his team during the Abu Dhabi F1 GP, he did more than give them instruction, he gave all of us Life Coaching and Business Management Advice.  Thank you, Kimi!  For making us all better Human Beings and Professional....Professionals!  It may be that Leo Parente and ShakeDown took the words of Kimi too seriously.  On the other hand......
